TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInterceptors

summary.para: A service that resolves a single from all those registered on the or in the internal service provider.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

The service lifetime is . This means that each instance will use its own instance of this service. The implementation may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementation does not need to be thread-safe.

Docs.remarks: See EF Core interceptors for more information.

Docs.summary: Resolves a single from all those registered on the or in the internal service provider.
Docs.returns: The resolved interceptor, which may be if none are registered.
